intro.title: What is a Wallet?
intro.description: A wallet is used to send, receive, store, and display digital assets. It's also a new way to log in, without needing to create new accounts and passwords on every website.

digital_asset.title: A Home for your Digital Assets
digital_asset.description: Wallets are used to send, receive, store, and display digital assets like Ethereum and NFTs.

login.title: A New Way to Log In
login.description: Instead of creating new accounts and passwords on every website, just connect your wallet.

sign_in.label: Verify your account
sign_in.description: To finish connecting, you must sign a message in your wallet to verify that you are the owner of this account.

status.confirm_mobile: Accept connection request in the wallet

description.full: Need a wallet pairing code to connect?

mobile.description: Select a wallet on the main screen to get started with a different wallet provider.

desktop.compact_description: Select a wallet on the main screen to get started with a different wallet provider.
desktop.wide_description: Select a wallet on the left to get started with a different wallet provider.

mobile.title: %{wallet} for Mobile
mobile.description: Use the mobile wallet to explore the world of Ethereum.

extension.title: %{wallet} for %{browser}
extension.description: Access your wallet right from your favorite web browser.

desktop.title: %{wallet} for %{platform}
desktop.description: Access your wallet natively from your powerful desktop.

get_mobile.title: Install %{wallet}
get_mobile.description: Scan with your phone to download on iOS or Android

chains.title: Switch Networks
chains.wrong_network: Wrong network detected, switch or disconnect to continue.
chains.switching_not_supported: Your wallet does not support switching networks from %{appName}. Try switching networks from within your wallet instead.
chains.switching_not_supported_fallback: Your wallet does not support switching networks from this app. Try switching networks from within your wallet instead.

step1.title: Open the %{wallet} app
step1.description: We recommend putting %{wallet} on your home screen for quicker access.

step2.title: Create or Import a Wallet
step2.description: Be sure to back up your wallet using a secure method. Never share your secret phrase with anyone.

step3.title: Tap the scan button
step3.description: After you scan, a connection prompt will appear for you to connect your wallet.
